definition: variant of 小兒麻痺|小儿麻痹/infantile paralysis/polio (poliomyelitis)

pinyin: xiao3 er2 ma2 bi4 bing4 du2

definition: variant of 麻痺|麻痹[ma2 bi4]
localized pain disorder (in Chinese medicine)/arthralgia syndrome/bi disorder
variant of 腦性麻痺|脑性麻痹/cerebral palsy/spasticity
palsy/trembling paralysis/used for Parkinson's disease 帕金森病[Pa4 jin1 sen1 bing4]

sentences.english: The experiences of Liu Duzhou for the treatment of damp-heat Bi syndrome were introduced in this article.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍了刘渡舟治疗湿热痹的经验。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the curative effect of Zhuang medicine Bazhuguan for arthralgia-syndrome.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察壮医药物竹筒拔罐治疗痹病的疗效。

sentences.english: Clinical effects of bitongling capsule on rheumatoid arthritis at active phase;
sentences.chinese: 目的研究痹痛定胶囊治疗类风湿性关节炎的疗效。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the Bitongling granules curative effect on rheumatoid arthritis (RA) cases.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察痹痛灵颗粒对佐剂性关节炎大鼠疗效的影响。

sentences.english: The damp-heat Bi syndrome were divided into three types and three stages.
sentences.chinese: 刘渡舟临床常将湿热痹分为三型三期。

sentences.english: There's a shell on the sand.
sentences.chinese: 正在沙岸上有一个痹忧。

sentences.english: Aim To research the clinical efficacy of Fengtongning Pill FTN on treatment of Bi syndrome induced by wind, cold and dampness.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察风湿痛消丸治疗风寒湿痹病的临床疗效。

sentences.english: Not only the evils of wind, cold, dampness and heat, but also depression of gan-qi can result in bi-zheng.
sentences.chinese: 痹证病因非独感风寒湿热等外邪所致，肝郁也可致痹。

sentences.english: The transversus abdominis plane (TAP) block is a peripheral nerve block which anaesthetises the abdominal wall.
sentences.chinese: 腹横肌平面阻滞是一种会痲痹腹壁的周边神经阻滞。

definition: hematoma (internal blood clot)/extravasated blood (spilt into surrounding tissue)/contusion
localized pain disorder (in Chinese medicine)/arthralgia syndrome/bi disorder
clotted blood/extravasated blood (leaking into surrounding tissue)/thrombosis
to obstruct/to stop up/to heap soil around the roots of a plant
to relieve (cold, rheumatic pain etc)/lit. to dispel pathogenic wind (TCM)
